text: @DrDenaGrayson @eileenguo @SaysDana @thespybrief I always believed a figure of 50k was more realistic.  There was a interview purportedly with a crematorium worker who said they were receiving 8x the number of bodies marked as #COVID-19 and they were being to ordered to treat them all if they were COVID-19
